title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop - Revolutionize Your Cleaning Experience!**

Are you tired of using separate vacuum and mop cleaners? Do you struggle with messy cords and limited cleaning time? Look no further than the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, the ultimate all-in-one solution for your hard floors and area rugs!

**Cordless Convenience**: With up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time, you can tackle any mess without being tethered to a power outlet. The 36V Lithium-Ion battery provides reliable performance and easy recharging.

**Multi-Surface Cleaning**: This powerful vacuum and mop cleaner effortlessly transitions between hard floors, area rugs, tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and more!

**Improved Edge Cleaning**: Say goodbye to messy corners and crevices! The CrossWave Cordless Max features improved edge cleaning for a thorough and precise clean.

**Two-Tank Technology**: Separate water and dirt tanks ensure efficient cleaning without mixing dirty water back into your clean solution. This feature also makes maintenance and cleaning a breeze!

**Self-Cleaning Cycle**: After each use, the CrossWave Cordless Max automatically cleans its brush roll and tank for minimal upkeep.

**BISSELL Connect App Compatibility**: Monitor and control your cleaning sessions remotely using our BISSELL Connect app, available for iOS and Android devices.

**Charitable Support**: A portion of every sale supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, dedicated to helping pet adoption and fostering a love for pets in need.

**What's Included**:

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

**Order Now and Experience the Power of CrossWave!**

Discover the ultimate cleaning solution that combines the best of both worlds - vacuuming and mopping - in one convenient, cordless package. Say goodbye to messy cords, limited cleaning time, and cumbersome equipment. The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is ready to revolutionize your cleaning routine!

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max: Revolutionize Your Cleaning Routine!**

Are you tired of using multiple cleaning tools for your hard floors and area rugs? Look no further! The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is a game-changing all-in-one wet-dry vacuum cleaner and mop that makes quick work of any mess. With its powerful rotating brush system, improved edge cleaning, and 2-tank technology, you'll be able to tackle even the toughest dirt and grime with ease.

**Key Features:**

* Cordless design for up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning
* 36V Lithium-Ion battery for reliable power
* Rotating brush system for effective pet hair removal and surface cleaning
* Improved edge cleaning for tight spaces and corners
* 2-tank technology for easy separation of clean water and dirty dirt
* Carry handle for effortless transport
* Swivel head for easy maneuverability

**But That's Not All!**

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max also comes with a range of innovative features that make it stand out from the competition. With its WiFi-connected capabilities, you can control your cleaner remotely using the BISSELL Connect app. Plus, its self-cleaning cycle ensures that your brush roll is always clean and ready for use.

**And Did We Mention?**

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max also supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, a charity dedicated to helping pets in need. With every purchase, you'll be contributing to a good cause and making a difference in the lives of furry friends everywhere.

**What's Included:**

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

Don't settle for mediocre cleaning results any longer. Upgrade to the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max today and experience the power of a true all-in-one cleaner!

**Order Now and Get Ready to Revolutionize Your Cleaning Routine!**

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop - Revolutionize Your Cleaning Experience!**

Are you tired of using multiple cleaning tools for different surfaces? Look no further! Our BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is a game-changer. This powerful, all-in-one vacuum cleaner and mop combines the best of both worlds to give you a deep clean like never before.

**Cordless Convenience**

With up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time, you can tackle those hard-to-reach areas without worrying about running out of power. The 36V Lithium-Ion battery provides reliable performance and long-lasting durability.

**Multi-Surface Cleaning**

Our CrossWave Cordless Max is designed for versatility, with the ability to clean hard floors, area rugs, and even pet hair-covered surfaces. The rotating brush system and improved edge cleaning ensure a thorough clean every time.

**WiFi Connected and Self-Cleaning**

Stay connected with your cleaning routine through our BISSELL Connect app, receiving notifications when maintenance tasks are required. Plus, enjoy the convenience of self-cleaning cycles for easy tank emptying and brush roll cleaning.

**Charitable Giving**

At BISSELL, we believe in giving back to those in need. That's why a portion of our proceeds goes towards supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping animals find their forever homes.

**What's Included:**

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

**Upgrade Your Cleaning Experience Today!**

Get ready to experience the power and convenience of our BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop. Order now and start enjoying a cleaner, healthier home - with less effort!

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop - Revolutionize Your Cleaning Routine!**

Are you tired of juggling multiple cleaning tools to get the job done? Look no further than the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, a game-changing all-in-one vacuum cleaner and mop that makes quick work of hard floors and area rugs.

**Cordless Convenience**: With up to 30 minutes of continuous cleaning on a single charge, you can effortlessly glide across your home without being tethered by cords. The 36V Lithium-Ion battery provides reliable power and durability.

**Multi-Surface Mastery**: This versatile cleaner tackles tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs with ease, thanks to its rotating brush system and adjustable cleaning path width of 10.5 inches.

**Improved Edge Cleaning**: Say goodbye to pesky edges and corners! The CrossWave Cordless Max features an improved edge cleaning design that ensures a thorough clean every time.

**Two-Tank Technology**: With separate water and dirt tanks, you can effortlessly switch between vacuuming and mopping without the hassle of mixing or rinsing. The 28 oz water tank and 18.6 oz dirt tank provide ample capacity for most cleaning tasks.

**Self-Cleaning Cycle**: After each use, the CrossWave Cordless Max's self-cleaning cycle ensures your brush rolls are clean and ready for the next task.

**BISSELL Connect App**: Stay connected to your cleaner through our BISSELL Connect app, which allows you to monitor battery life, schedule cleaning sessions, and receive notifications when maintenance is needed.

**Charitable Support**: With every purchase, a portion of proceeds goes towards supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping to find forever homes for pets in need.

**What's Included**:

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

Don't settle for mediocre cleaning results. Upgrade to the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max and experience the power of all-in-one cleaning!

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max: The Ultimate All-in-One Cleaning Solution**

Are you tired of juggling multiple cleaning tools and wasting time switching between vacuum, mop, and wet/dry functions? Look no further! The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is here to revolutionize your cleaning routine.

**Cordless Convenience**: With up to 30 minutes of battery life, you can clean without worrying about cords getting in the way. Perfect for quick cleanups or extended sessions.

**Multi-Surface Mastery**: This versatile cleaner effortlessly transitions between hard floors and area rugs, tackling a wide range of surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and more!

**Rotating Brush System**: Our innovative brush design ensures maximum dirt pickup, while the swivel head allows for effortless maneuverability.

**Improved Edge Cleaning**: Get into tight spaces with our enhanced edge cleaning feature, making it easy to clean along baseboards, stairs, and other hard-to-reach areas.

**Self-Cleaning Cycle**: After each use, simply press a button and let the CrossWave Cordless Max self-clean its brush roll, keeping your cleaning experience seamless and efficient.

**BISSELL Connect App Compatibility**: Monitor battery life, schedule cleanings, and receive notifications with our user-friendly app.

**Two-Tank Technology**: With separate water and dirt tanks, you'll never have to worry about mixing dirty water or wasting valuable cleaning solution.

**Charitable Support**: For every purchase, a portion of the proceeds goes towards supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping to care for pets in need.

**What's Included?**

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

Don't settle for mediocre cleaning results. Upgrade to the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max and experience the power of all-in-one cleaning, without the hassle! Order now and start enjoying a cleaner, healthier home with confidence.

**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max: Revolutionize Your Cleaning Routine**

Are you tired of using multiple cleaning tools for different surfaces? Do you struggle with cords getting in the way or running out of battery power mid-clean? Look no further! The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is here to change the game. This innovative, all-in-one wet-dry vacuum cleaner and mop is designed to make your life easier and your floors cleaner.

**Cordless Convenience**

With up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning time, you can tackle any mess without being tethered to a wall outlet. The 36V Lithium-Ion battery provides powerful suction and effortless maneuverability, making it perfect for hard floors, area rugs, and even pet hair.

**Improved Edge Cleaning**

Say goodbye to those pesky corners and edges! Our improved edge cleaning technology ensures that every inch of your floor is cleaned with precision and ease. Plus, the swivel head makes it easy to navigate around furniture and tight spaces.

**Multi-Surface Mastery**

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max is designed for versatility. Clean hard floors, area rugs, tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and more with ease. The rotating brush system and 10.5-inch cleaning path width make quick work of even the largest messes.

**Tank Capacities**

With two tanks - one for water and one for dirt - you can clean without worrying about running out of juice mid-cycle. The 28-ounce water tank and 18.6-ounce dirt tank ensure that you can tackle any cleaning task with confidence.

**Smart Features**

Stay connected to your cleaning routine with the BISSELL Connect app, which allows you to schedule cleanings, monitor battery life, and receive notifications when it's time to clean. Plus, the self-cleaning cycle keeps your brush rolls in top condition.

**Give Back with Every Clean**

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, a charity dedicated to helping pets in need find forever homes.

**What's Included:**

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

Don't wait - get your BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max today and experience the power of cordless cleaning like never before!
